email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

I hope you're doing well. We have a vessel available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao. The vessel OCEAN HORIZON is currently open and can accommodate 150,000MT. The freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT under CIF terms.

Let me know if you need further details or if you'd like to proceed.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the laycan for this shipment?

Best,
James Anderson

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

The OCEAN HORIZON has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is flexible, but we are targeting a loading window starting around 2023-10-20.

Regarding the rate, we believe it is competitive given the current market conditions. However, we are open to discussions.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the additional details. We are considering combining cargo from a nearby port to optimize the vessel’s round trip. Could you provide a quote for a multi-port option?

Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

For a multi-port option, we would need to look at the specifics, but we can certainly discuss it. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day.

Let me know if you have more details on the additional port and cargo size.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

We are looking at an additional 50,000MT from a port nearby Tubarao. Could you revise the freight quote considering this additional cargo?

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Considering the additional cargo, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 17.50 per MT. This rate takes into account the economies of scale with the increased cargo size.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

The revised rate looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We are all set on our end.

Looking forward to a smooth operation.

Best,
James
